alert.note: Alert for Bulloch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 30 at 2:31PM EDT until August 30 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BULLOCH COUNTY... At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Statesboro, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include: Statesboro. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
